channel.title: Blank source and client to learn with
channel.description:
Sorry if this is in the wrong place if it is can someone please move it
So i want to start learning how to make a server so if anyone can show me an almost blank server i can use to work on and teach myself things that would be great
Any other tips would be greatly appreciated
